general_info.summary: This document provides an overview of Noida International University (NIU), detailing its various departments, administrative structures, policies, and academic offerings. It highlights career opportunities, leadership, and institutional reports, alongside specific school departments and admission procedures. Key policies related to fees, scholarships, and accommodation are listed, along with information on training and placement processes, alumni, and recruiters. The text also mentions the application process for admissions in 2025, outlining the steps and required documents for national and international students.

Thank you for your interest in Noida International University admission. This section explains the complete procedure of the application process. It makes it simple for the students by telling them step-by-step procedures. It also mentions the documents required for both National and international students.

admission_requirements.summary: This document outlines the admission process for Noida International University (NIU), which can involve the NSAT exam for technical programs, or Group Discussion/Personal Interview for non-technical programs. The university also considers national-level exams like JEE and CUET. The admission process is entirely online, requiring applicants to submit an application form with supporting documents, pay an application fee, undergo document verification, and if applicable, take an entrance exam or GD/PI. Admission confirmation is contingent on fee payment, with a strict deadline to secure a seat.
admission_requirements.raw_content:
Apply for CUET CounsellingAdmission Process
• Apply for CUET Counselling
Admission AlertsAdmission and Outreach TeamPh.D. AdmissionsDomestic Brochure (Indian Students)Prospectus
• Admission and Outreach Team
• Domestic Brochure (Indian Students)
Noida International University course admissions to the programs offered at NIU happen through the NSAT (NIU Scholarship cum Admission Test) for Technical Programs or through GD/PI for non-technical programs. We also consider State-level and National-level entrance exams like JEE & CUET.
Step-by-Step: Noida University Admission Process
STEP 01 – Fill in Application Form
STEP 02 – Verification of Documents / Entrance Exam
STEP 03 – Pay your Semester / Annual Fees
STEP 04 – Admission Confirmation
Our whole application process is online, and our payment process is both online and offline. It is recommended that the applications be completed in all aspects and submitted for Noida International University admission along with the required documents. If your documents are found missing, you will be notified immediately, and your application will not be reviewed until they are received.
Step 1 – Complete the Online Application Form & Submit the Documents
Candidates have to fill out their online application form from the below link:
When you submit your online application, you will be charged INR1100 (non–refundable) towards the application fee via net banking/credit card/debit card/wallet. (* as per the bank details and online payment link mentioned below)
• Class 10 / SSC Mark Sheet / “O” Level Certificate or equivalent marksheet
• 10+2 / Intermediate Marks Sheet / “A” Level Certificate or equivalent marksheet for undergraduate and postgraduate courses
• Graduation or equivalent marksheet for postgraduate courses
• If required: Certification for Equivalence from AIU
• If required: Counselling letter from CUET
• Transfer / Migration certificate (if any)
• Aadhar Card (for National students)
• 4 recent passport-size photos
• *Transcripts in languages other than English/Hindi are not acceptable.
Once your application form is received at the admission cell, an acknowledgement will be sent to your email.
Step 2 – Verification of the Documents
Upon successful verification of your eligibility and submitted documents, the detailed schedule for your entrance test / GD PI, including date, time, and venue, will be sent to your registered email ID.
Step 4 – Offer of Admission
The University will issue an offer/provisional admission letter if the student qualifies in the examination or fulfills the eligibility criteria.
Provisional admission letter will only be issued once the semester/annual fee payment is confirmed from our accounts department.
Registered / waitlist students are suggested to pay the balance fee immediately within 15 days of receiving the offer letter to confirm their seat toward their Noida International University admission. Failing which, the allotted seat can be transferred to other waitlist students.
Source: https://niu.edu.in/admission-process/

feedback.summary: This text lists various sources of feedback related to a university or educational institution, including feedback from students on the curriculum, teachers, and the university overall. It also includes feedback from teachers on the curriculum, as well as feedback from alumni, parents, and employers. Additionally, a course exit survey is mentioned as another feedback mechanism.
